document.full_text: miami won "the decision" when lebron james announced he was coming to south beach, and starting tuesday, the heat will be hoping he can deliver the knockout against the dallas mavericks and bring the florida franchise a second nba title.
document.title: heat hope "the decision" leads to title knockout of mavs
lines_and_colors: miami won "the decision" when lebron james announced he was coming to south beach, and starting tuesday, the heat will be hoping he can deliver the knockout against the dallas mavericks and bring the florida franchise a second nba title.
